attributes.title: Stole my money
attributes.review: This app took 5 bands of my money out of my credit card, unbelievable.😡😡🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: What politics 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I opened the app to learn more about the “president” of the USA but instead I opened an app that talked about a Cheeto man and his story and tutorial to become a Oompa Loompa.🧚💫❤️🧚👄

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTINGLY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: By far the worst app I’ve come across design colours and pictures are poorly chosen and not appealing to the eyes what so ever. Hopefully this app is removed.

attributes.title: It ate Ching Chong
attributes.review: Omg this app stoleMy crocodile while I was sleeping then drove my car today it wrecked it and you won’t believe what happend next in ate my Ching Chong slave

attributes.title: Ewwwww
attributes.review: Worst app ever!!!! You’d literally have to pay people to get it and even then nobody would get it

attributes.title: This is not ok
attributes.review: I open the app and I see a orange I was like NO then I see the app called trump 2020 why are people voting or a orange 😤 this app is just no 🍊

attributes.title: Ewww
attributes.review: Most disgusting app I have ever seen. Trump right now is in the White House, soon he will be in hell, but not soon enough

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: Black lives matter. LGBTQIA lives matter. Trans lives matter. Our schools matter. First Nation lives matter. Defund the police. Re-fund our schools. Blue 2020!!

attributes.title: Too Glitchy
attributes.review: This app has soo many glitches.
